channel.title: CVE Feed for CA Technologies, A Broadcom Company -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CA Technologies, A Broadcom Company -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-7394|2024-09-17T01:16:51.683Z -- ca%20technologies%2C%20a%20broadcom%20company -- ca%20strong%20authentication
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability in the administrative user interface of CA Technologies CA Strong Authentication 9.0.x, 8.2.x, 8.1.x, 8.0.x, 7.1.x and CA Risk Authentication 9.0.x, 8.2.x, 8.1.x, 8.0.x, 3.1.x allows an authenticated attacker to gain additional privileges in some cases where an account has customized and limited privileges.

item.title: CVE-2019-13657|2024-09-17T02:31:44.581Z -- ca%20technologies%2C%20a%20broadcom%20company -- ca%20performance%20management
item.description: CA Performance Management 3.5.x, 3.6.x before 3.6.9, and 3.7.x before 3.7.4 have a default credential vulnerability that can allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands and compromise system security.

item.title: CVE-2019-13658|2024-09-17T01:50:58.714Z -- ca%20technologies%2C%20a%20broadcom%20company -- ca%20network%20flow%20analysis
item.description: CA Network Flow Analysis 9.x and 10.0.x have a default credential vulnerability that can allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands and compromise system security.

item.title: CVE-2019-19230|2024-09-17T02:16:04.832Z -- ca%20technologies%2C%20a%20broadcom%20company -- ca%20release%20automation
item.description: An unsafe deserialization vulnerability exists in CA Release Automation (Nolio) 6.6 with the DataManagement component that can allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code.
